name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】Total Eclipse of the Moon #MoonaHoshinova3D 【Moona Hoshinova ⧸ hololive ID】 [_VKWFWDGhSQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Moona Hoshinova performs the song "BLUE CLAPPER".
MC section where Moona talks about the performance and introduces her mascot Momo.

subtitles.original: Three!
subtitles.english: Three!

subtitles.original: Two!
subtitles.english: Two!

subtitles.original: One!
subtitles.english: One!

subtitles.original: 発進　見落とさず Diving　待っても意味ない Timing
subtitles.english: Dive in without missing the start; there's no point in waiting for the timing

subtitles.original: 溢れそうな涙に Swimming Swimming
subtitles.english: Swimming in the tears that are about to overflow

subtitles.original: 弾けてる Lightning　まだ見えないよ Maybe
subtitles.english: Popping lightning; I still can't see it, maybe

subtitles.original: この先は何があるの?
subtitles.english: What's lying ahead?

subtitles.original: まだ早いよ　夜明け　追い付くまで　夜更け
subtitles.english: It's still too early for dawn; late at night until it catches up

subtitles.original: でもたまには止まって Thinking Thinking
subtitles.english: But sometimes stop and think

subtitles.original: 前を見据えて Ready　踏み出すのは勇気
subtitles.english: Eyes on the front, ready; taking a step is courage

subtitles.original: 掴んでみせるよ　キラキラ輝くの!
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can grab it, it'll sparkle and shine!

subtitles.original: My story　叶う日待ってる
subtitles.english: My story, waiting for the day it comes true

subtitles.original: 砂時計から
subtitles.english: From the hourglass

subtitles.original: 叫んで　君にずっと見てて欲しいから
subtitles.english: Shouting, because I want you to keep watching me

subtitles.original: 手を挙げて Clap your hands　空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands　響き渡るように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands so that it resonates

subtitles.original: 響かせて　響かせて
subtitles.english: Let it resonate, let it resonate

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に
subtitles.english: Come on, together

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap your hands　空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands　響き渡るように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands so that it resonates

subtitles.original: 響かせて　響かせて
subtitles.english: Let it resonate, let it resonate

subtitles.original: 光り射す　僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: Our future shining with light

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 終わらないブラッシング　決めていくよ　Breaking
subtitles.english: Never-ending brushing, deciding on the breaking

subtitles.original: 勘違いでもいいでしょ　衝動に夢中
subtitles.english: It's fine if it's a misunderstanding, right? Absorbed in the impulse

subtitles.original: 君は何を Feeling?　解き放てよ Sparking
subtitles.english: What are you feeling? Unleash the sparking

subtitles.original: 暗闇に放つレーザービーム
subtitles.english: A laser beam shot into the darkness

subtitles.original: 光らせて　ステージ　創るから
subtitles.english: Let it shine, because I'll create the stage

subtitles.original: さあ叫んで　君にもっと見てて欲しいから
subtitles.english: Now shout, because I want you to watch me more

subtitles.english: Even if the end comes, I don't know

subtitles.original: 何度だって回るよ　期待したいの
subtitles.english: It'll spin any number of times; I want to have expectations

subtitles.original: Itu dia! Thank you everyone for listening Blue Clapper!
subtitles.english: That was it! Thank you everyone for listening to Blue Clapper!

subtitles.original: As you can see...
subtitles.english: As you can see...

subtitles.original: This song is so hype!
subtitles.english: This song is so hype!

subtitles.original: I just can't stop jumping.
subtitles.english: I just can't stop jumping.

subtitles.original: I just like, "Ooh, I want to like using this song for hyping,"
subtitles.english: I was like, "Ooh, I want to use this song to get hyped,"

subtitles.original: because you know, jumping while singing is fun even though I'm just like (heavy breathing).
subtitles.english: because you know, jumping while singing is fun even though I'm just like (heavy breathing).

subtitles.original: But it's fine.
subtitles.english: But it's fine.

subtitles.original: That's fine.
subtitles.english: That's fine.

subtitles.original: Anyway...
subtitles.english: Anyway...

subtitles.original: Have you guys seen? Have you guys seen this?
subtitles.english: Have you guys seen? Have you guys seen this?

subtitles.original: This!
subtitles.english: This!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: It's Momo!
subtitles.english: It's Momo!

subtitles.original: Lucu kan? Lucu kan? Lucu kan?
subtitles.english: Cute, right? Cute, right? Cute, right?

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Jadi next, Moona bakal menyanyikan lagu sambil diliatin Momo.
subtitles.english: So next, Moona will sing a song while being watched by Momo.

subtitles.original: Jadi, ya gitulah. Kita nyanyi sambil joget.
subtitles.english: So, yeah, that's how it is. We'll sing while dancing.

subtitles.original: Terus nanti ada Momo-lah di sekitar situ.
subtitles.english: Then Momo will be around there later.

subtitles.original: Kalian nikmati aja, oke?
subtitles.english: You guys just enjoy it, okay?

subtitles.original: Alright!
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: Momo, kamu ke depannya.
subtitles.english: Momo, you go to the front.

subtitles.original: Shuuu!
subtitles.english: Shuuu!

subtitles.original: Alright.
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: You guys ready?
subtitles.english: You guys ready?
